1.0.name: wordpress/blogroll-autolinker
1.0.description: Blogroll Autolinker automatically turns names from your blogroll into links in your posts. Insert names from your Links Manager in posts and pages and they’ll be turned into links in the published post. You can control which names become links with customizable markup, e.g., square brackets: [link name].
